thread.title: Carriers Freight Review (W27)

author: shippingherald.com
title: Carriers Freight Review (W27)
text:
CAPESIZE
A vessel shortage in the South Atlantic last week was the driving factor behind a rapid surge in capesize rates, with yearly highs recorded on key trade routes. This shortage combined with large iron ore volumes from Brazil, it was enough to drive the market.
Meanwhile the strong South Atlantic market stretched vessel supply in the North Atlantic has been pushing up that market also.
